title: Regarding your list of salaries made by directors of local non-profits, how do the Country Club of Landfall and the Cape Fear Country Club qualify as non-profits?  What services do they provide and to whom?
text:
By law, country clubs are allowed to incorporate as nonprofit
organizations.

Here's the N.C. Center for Nonprofits on the question:

http://www.njnonprofits.org/Whats-a-np.html

But you cannot deduct contributions to country clubs:

http://www.irs.gov/publications/p17/ch24.html#en_US_2012_publink100034138
